metaDescription: PROJECT 303 Benissa: 4-bed luxury villa from €2,450,000. TURIS PROMOCIONES development delivering January 2027. Costa Blanca investment.

content.heroIntro: PROJECT 303 represents an exceptional opportunity in Benissa, one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential destinations. Developed by TURIS PROMOCIONES, this exclusive villa project combines modern architecture with Mediterranean charm, offering a sophisticated lifestyle in a prime location. With delivery scheduled for 01-01-2027, this is your chance to secure a premium property before completion. PROJECT 303 features a stunning 4-bedroom, 5-bathroom villa set on a generous 1,530m² plot, with 436m² of elegantly appointed living space. The development showcases high-quality finishes, contemporary design, and premium amenities that appeal to discerning international buyers seeking both luxury and investment potential. Located in Benitolo, Benissa, this villa offers the perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility, with excellent connectivity to beaches, golf courses, and essential services. TURIS PROMOCIONES brings years of expertise in creating exceptional residential communities, ensuring every detail meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.

locationSection.intro: Benitolo, Benissa is a coveted destination on the Costa Blanca, renowned for its stunning Mediterranean coastline, exclusive residential communities, and exceptional quality of life. This charming area combines the peaceful serenity of rural Alicante with convenient access to world-class amenities. Benissa attracts an established international community, where English is widely spoken and diverse cultural experiences enhance daily life. The region offers a perfect blend of relaxation and activity—from pristine Blue Flag beaches to championship golf courses. With top-rated international schools, modern healthcare facilities, and vibrant local markets, Benitolo provides everything families and retirees seek. The area's consistent property value growth and strong rental market make it an attractive investment destination for discerning buyers.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses including Ifach Golf nearby
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Mediterranean dining and international cuisine throughout Benissa

propertyFeatures.intro: PROJECT 303 exemplifies modern construction standards and premium Mediterranean design. TURIS PROMOCIONES has meticulously engineered this villa with superior materials and energy-efficient systems. The development features state-of-the-art construction techniques, thermal insulation, and contemporary finishes throughout. Each villa is designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, while maintaining optimal comfort year-round. The attention to detail in every room reflects a commitment to luxury living, from spacious layouts to high-quality fixtures and fittings that ensure longevity and aesthetic appeal.
features: Private swimming pool with stunning views
Double glazing with thermal break insulation
Modern bathroom fixtures with rainfall showers
Video entry system with smart home capability

content.investmentSection: PROJECT 303 presents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic property markets. Benissa has demonstrated consistent growth with property values increasing +8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing national averages. The area's strong rental market generates substantial returns, with comparable villas commanding €800+ per week in the peak season. Notably, PROJECT 303 prices are approximately 40% below comparable properties in Spanish island markets, offering exceptional value without compromising quality. The established international community and growing demand for luxury villas ensure sustained market appreciation. With favorable tax conditions for foreign investors and Spain's stable economy, PROJECT 303 combines lifestyle benefits with solid financial returns, making it an ideal choice for portfolio diversification.
whyBuySection: Strategic location in prestigious Benitolo, Benissa
Trusted developer: TURIS PROMOCIONES with proven track record

faqs.question: What is the price of PROJECT 303?
faqs.answer: PROJECT 303 starts from €2,450,000. This includes a 4-bedroom, 5-bathroom villa with 436m² of living space on a 1,530m² plot. Contact us for current availability and payment plan options.

faqs.question: When will PROJECT 303 be completed?
faqs.answer: PROJECT 303 will be delivered on 01-01-2027. TURIS PROMOCIONES provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty. Contact us for detailed construction timelines and specific unit delivery dates.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of PROJECT 303?
faqs.answer: TURIS PROMOCIONES is the developer, an established company with extensive experience building quality residential communities throughout Benissa and the Costa Blanca region. They are committed to excellence in every project.

faqs.question: Is Benissa a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Benissa features an established international community where English is commonly spoken. Property values demonstrate +8% year-on-year growth, with excellent amenities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and several championship golf courses nearby.

faqs.question: How far is PROJECT 303 from the beach?
faqs.answer: PROJECT 303 is within 20 minutes of multiple pristine Blue Flag beaches, offering easy access to Mediterranean coastal living while maintaining peaceful residential surroundings.

faqs.question: What amenities are near PROJECT 303?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; regional hospital within 30 minutes plus private clinics; several championship golf courses; multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes; and diverse dining options throughout Benissa.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. No visa is required for property purchase. You will need an NIE (Spanish Tax Identification Number) for the transaction. Our team assists with all legal requirements.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Typical costs include: transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registration fees (0.1-0.5%), and legal fees (1-2%). These are usually paid by the buyer. We provide detailed cost breakdowns during your purchase consultation.

faqs.question: What are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual property taxes (IBI) typically range from 0.4-1.1% of cadastral value. Non-resident properties may have additional taxes. Tax rates vary by municipality. Contact us for specific tax estimates for PROJECT 303.

content.conclusion: PROJECT 303 in Benissa represents a rare opportunity to acquire a luxury villa in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. With delivery in January 2027, TURIS PROMOCIONES is creating an exclusive community that combines sophisticated living with excellent investment potential. The combination of prime location, premium construction quality, established international community, and strong market fundamentals makes PROJECT 303 an exceptional choice for buyers seeking Mediterranean elegance and financial security. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, vacation retreat, or investment property, PROJECT 303 delivers on every front. Don't miss this opportunity to be part of Benissa's exclusive development. Contact us today via WhatsApp for detailed information, virtual tours, and personalized investment guidance. Our team is ready to help you make your PROJECT 303 dream a reality.
